1: <pb/><e>Sb'it David jun tic yic scolchj eb' israel 'a yol sc'ab eb' 'ajc'ojol</e> <pb/><t>Q'uinloc man̈toc x'och Jehová quet'ec, ¿tasm on̈ 'ajec? Ax ticnec ex wit israelal calc 'ixtic:</t>
2: <t>Q'uinloc man̈ 'ayc 'och Jehová quet'ec, to 'ixta ax yic xq'ue wan eb' 'anma yac' owl quet'ec,</t>
3: <t>ton̈j am on̈ spitzn b'u'j 'ejm eb', yujto 'ay cot wal yowl eb' 'ayn̈ec.</t>
4: <t>Lajn am on̈ yutjec eb' 'icha tzyac' junc a 'elmal a tzon̈ 'i'nec 'ati; tz'ec' a 'a quib'n̈ec.</t>
5: <t>'Icha a 'elmal a cha, 'ixta am x'aj eb' yec' 'a quib'n̈ec, xqui chiec.</t>
6: <pb/><t>¡Calc wach' paxti 'a Jehová! Yujto ma'on̈ ya'c 'a yol sc'ab' eb' 'ajc'ojol yic on̈ satnec 'el eb'.</t>
7: <t>Ma'on̈ ya'c ganar eb' qui canc 'a sya'al. On̈ colchjec 'el 'a yol sc'ab' eb', 'icha tzyac' junc no ch'ic tz'el 'a junc ya'al, 'ixta 'on̈ 'ajec.</t>
8: <t>A jun qui colnb'ilec tic, ata tzcot 'a Jehová qui Diosalec, atn jun b'ojnac satcha'an̈ yet' lum lum tic.</t>
